HowMuchDidYouSpendTodayQuestion: How much did you spend today ?
ThankYou: If you want to support us , you can leave a rating and a review in google play, or buy the pro version of the app , unlocking all of its funcionalities for lifetime! If you have purchased the pro version in the past, tap the button to retrieve your license instantly.
SwiperTutorial0: Before you jump into the app , let's see some of its features!
SwiperTutorial1: This is the main view. There are 3 main sections, the 1st is about the budget, the 2nd about the calendar, and the 3rd for expenses.
SwiperTutorial2: First, set your current budget. When you hit confirm , you will be asked if you want to set the starting balance.
SwiperTutorial3: Press the button in the second section to set your payday. When you select a date, the amount that corresponds to each day until that date will be automatically calculated. When that date is reached, you payday will be automatically set to the next month.
SwiperTutorial4: You can track your daily expenses by pressing the button in the third section. Set an amount manually, or use the buttons on the right. You can also select the category of the expense, like coffee or gas (by default general expenses category is selected) .Then, hit confirm. By pressing the button again, you can see a list of the expenses you made today. Swipe right to see a pie chart of those expenses.
SwiperTutorial5: Additionaly, you can check the expenses of a past date, by bringing up the calendar and selecting said date. You can see which dates have available expenses list; theyre the ones with a blue dot under them. Select one of those dates, to view the expenses made on that day. The pie chart is also available here.
SwiperTutorial6: Dont forget to add the widget in your home screen! Its very useful for taking a quick look when you are in hurry. Press the update widget button inside the app, to update its values.
SwiperTutorial7: Finally, this is the settings menu. Here you can set automations, like passive incomes or fixed costs ,or even savings balances. These options are marked as pro features, but you get a free field for each one! You can even change the language and the currency, edit the expense categories, and also show your support by rating or buying the pro version, thus gaining access to all the features of the app, forever!
SwiperTutorial9: Yes, take me to the app!
SwiperTutorial10: No, show me the tutorial again.
SwiperTutorial12: The tutorial is important to get the full use out of the app! Skip anyway?
SwiperTutorial13: Don't worry, you can re-do the tutorial later.
